mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_policy tp where 1 = 1

select tp.policy_sn , tp.lang_code , tp.policy_code , tp.policy_ver , tp.expsr_yn , tp.applc_de , tp.policy_cn , tp.regist_dt , tp.register_sn , tp.updt_dt , tp.updusr_sn from tb_policy tp where 1 = 1
order by tp.policy_sn desc
order by tp.policy_code, tp.policy_ver desc

select tp.policy_sn , tp.lang_code , tp.policy_code , tp.policy_ver , tp.expsr_yn , tp.applc_de , tp.policy_cn , tp.regist_dt , tp.register_sn , tp.updt_dt , tp.updusr_sn from tb_policy tp where tp.policy_sn = #{policySn}

select tp.policy_sn , tp.lang_code , tp.policy_code , tp.policy_ver , tp.expsr_yn , tp.applc_de , tp.policy_cn , tp.regist_dt , tp.register_sn , tp.updt_dt , tp.updusr_sn from tb_policy tp where tp.lang_code = #{langCode} and tp.policy_code = #{policyCode} and tp.policy_ver = #{policyVer}
